content: The God of Sinai and of the Sanctuary.
To the Chief Musician. A Psalm of David. A Song.
Let those who hate Him flee before Him.
As smoke is driven away, so drive  away;
As wax melts before the fire,
So let the wicked  guilty perish before [the presence of] God.
But let the righteous be glad; let them be in good spirits before God,
Yes, let them rejoice with delight.
Sing to God, sing praises to His name;
Lift up  for Him who rides through the desert—
His name is the —be in good spirits before Him.
